body_html: Hi, some of your gradient is exploding. Try using a different optimizer, or try clipping gradient. The net result is that some predictions are leading to overflow in computation, and therefore nan, but it seems that in most cases your predictions are getting better.
body_text: Hi,  some of your gradient is exploding.  Try using a different optimizer, or try clipping gradient.  The net result is that some predictions are leading to overflow in computation, and therefore nan, but it seems that in most cases your predictions are getting better.
body: Hi,  some of your gradient is exploding.  Try using a different optimizer, or try clipping gradient.  The net result is that some predictions are leading to overflow in computation, and therefore nan, but it seems that in most cases your predictions are getting better.
